quote: Take free money. No matter how in debt you are, if your employer offers a matching contribution on a 401(k) or other retirement vehicle, you must sign up and contribute enough to get the maximum company match each year. Think of it as a bonus.

quote: Hollywood... a city I was to come back to time and again, in sickness and in health, in success and in failure, with anticipation and with dread.
author: Dirk Benedict

quote: Patience and tenacity are worth more than twice their weight of cleverness.

quote: Money is not the motivating force. It's nice to have money, but I don't live high. What I enjoy is running the business.

quote: In the end, all business operations can be reduced to three words: people, product, and profits.

quote: But I think it's more normal for my team to have no success than it is to win two consecutive European cups.

quote: I sang in the choir for years, even though my family belonged to another church.

quote: Nature puts no question and answers none which we mortals ask. She has long ago taken her resolution.

quote: It's sort of a mental attitude about critical thinking and curiosity. It's about mindset of looking at the world in a playful and curious and creative way.

quote: Marriage must incessantly contend with a monster that devours everything: familiarity.

quote: There are people out there who are older who are cool. I want that.

quote: Indy makes the race driver. You become famous when you come here.

quote: Wars spring from unseen and generally insignificant causes, the first outbreak being often but an explosion of anger.

quote: Not being known doesn't stop the truth from being true.

quote: And I think we understand we cannot make social change for all workers until we have enough strength, membership strength, and at the same time having membership strength and only making change for a limited group of workers is not what our country really needs for people that work.

quote: The west has a great deal to answer for in the Middle East, from Britain's belated empire-building after the First World War to the US and British policy that condemns modern Iraq to the material and social squalor of a half-century ago.

quote: It's been very hard, after being mostly a mom, to develop an adult life of my own. And not being married anymore, I have to come up with challenges.

quote: We're constantly buying airplane tickets we travel on the Concorde.

quote: Marriage is a great institution, but I'm not ready for an institution.

quote: When the missionaries came to Africa they had the Bible and we had the land. They said 'Let us pray.' We closed our eyes. When we opened them we had the Bible and they had the land.

quote: The ultimate ground of faith and knowledge is confidence in God.

quote: The vote is the most powerful instrument ever devised by man for breaking down injustice and destroying the terrible walls which imprison men because they are different from other men.
